articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Europe's access to space in jeopardy after Vega-C rocket failure - Bangkok Post
articles.description: KOUROU - Flights of the new European Vega-C rocket have been suspended pending an investigation into an overnight launch failure, French firm Arianespace said Wednesday, leaving Europe with few avenues into space.
articles.content: KOUROU - Flights of the new European Vega-C rocket have been suspended pending an investigation into an overnight launch failure, French firm Arianespace said Wednesday, leaving Europe with few avenu… [+4120 chars]

articles.title: ESA - Flight VV22 failure: Arianespace and ESA appoint an independent inquiry commission - European Space Agency
articles.content: Arianespace announced early today the failure of Flight VV22 carrying Pléiades Neo 5 and 6 satellites.The Vega-C launch vehicle lifted off as scheduled on 20 December at 22:47 local time in French Gu… [+3221 chars]

articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
articles.title: Europe's Vega rocket crashes back to Earth - BBC
articles.description: Europe's premier small rocket fails in flight again - the third time in eight outings.
articles.content:
Europe's premier small rocket has failed in flight once again.
The Vega vehicle was lost 2.5 minutes into its latest mission from the Kourou spaceport in French Guiana.
It was carrying two French-b… [+2782 chars]

articles.author: Ariana Eunjung Cha
articles.title: Invasive strep A is on the rise and affecting kids in unusual ways - The Washington Post
articles.description: Rare bacterial infections, such as invasive strep A, are popping up around the United States and Europe, with unusual effects for children.
articles.content:

articles.author: ANI
articles.title: Study reveals warning signs of sudden cardiac arrests for preventive measures - Devdiscourse
articles.description: According to a study by the European Society of Cardiology, sudden cardiac arrest does not occur completely unnoticed. This discovery could be a game-changer for preventive measures of this health emergency in patients at most risk.
articles.content: According to the findings of the ESCAPE-NET experiment, primary care visits increase dramatically in the weeks preceding a sudden cardiac arrest. 1 The European Heart Rhythm Association (EHRA) of the… [+3530 chars]
